Articles.Content:
Where does this tracking info get stored? Is it a text file somewhere I can read? I'd like to see what it's recording.

I know it's not yet visible in game and might not ever be as it's for the mission generation bit of campaign... but I'm curious.

It's located in your persistence.sfs file. It tracks things like first orbit, first crew to survive, and so on. It seems the first thing to land on the Mun for me was a lander leg, which is good I guess
You can also see messages pop up in the debug log when you progress.
